entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
